trends: There have been no other sightings in Buxton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailson vacation in pool in Buxton NC outer banks, floating in pool at appox. 10pm-10:40 with kids saw lights coming from south overhead, directly above us we could see 4 round lights in circular pattern red yellow blue and green. jumped outta pool freaked out making family look at it they were all seeing exact same thing as i was. i grew up in va beach va around many jets and different types of planes this is nothing like i have ever seen.
Summary: 4 round circular lights (red, yellow blue and green ) on bottom.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
